data.eml:eml: The leafhopper tribe Agalliini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Megophthalminae) in Pakistan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khatri, Imran (2010): The leafhopper tribe Agalliini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Megophthalminae) in Pakistan. Zootaxa 2614: 33-45, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197889
